channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Warp is introducing robots to automate its network of warehouses
item.description: Warp can't automate long-haul trucking or short-range delivery, so it's working on what it can potentially change: the workflows inside its warehouses...

item.title: Automattic acquires relationship manager Clay to add an identity layer to online tools
item.description: WordPress.com owner Automattic has added another communication-focused startup to its lineup: relationship-management app Clay.

item.title: Legal tech platform Definely raises $30M Series B to make contract reviewing more efficient
item.description: The company, based in the U.K., offers a productivity suite to streamline the legal drafting and review process.

item.title: How AI sales startup Landbase nabbed Ashton Kutcher’s Sound Ventures to lead its $30M Series A
item.description: A concept Landbase's CEO calls "digital trust" led nearly 130 VCs to pursue the "vibe GTM" startup.

item.title: Sony Bravia 8 II OLED TV Review: Strikingly Clear
item.description: Sony’s new OLED serves up stunning image clarity for high-end buyers.

item.title: How to Avoid Scams and Shoddy Wares on Amazon (2025)
item.description: Amazon is a mucky mess of ads, unknown sellers, misleading sales, and specious information. Defend your dollars while shopping on Amazon with these ti...

item.title: Drive brand impact with a Side Event at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Exciting news for tech enthusiasts and innovators! TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 is just around the corner, and we have an incredible opportunity for you to...

item.title: An Exclusive Look at Infinite Machine’s Olto Electric Bike
item.description: The startup wants to cut through the commuter ebike market with a $3,495 sit-down electric scooter that can still ride in city bike lanes.

item.title: 24 Gifts for Dads Who Don’t Need Anything (2025)
item.description: The best gift idea for your dad is a nicer version of something he already owns. The second best is one of these things.

item.title: Best Merino Wool T-Shirts (2025), Tried On and Tested
item.description: These merino wool T-shirts are the last shirt you’ll ever wear. I’m wearing one right now.
